mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `inquiry_tbl` VALUES (default, #{name}, #{phone}, #{company}, #{header}, #{contents}, default, default, default)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `inquiry_tbl` WHERE `inquiryType`='온라인문의' ORDER BY `no` DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM `inquiry_tbl` WHERE `no` = (SELECT MIN(no) FROM `inquiry_tbl` WHERE `no` > #{no})
SELECT * FROM `inquiry_tbl` WHERE `no` = (SELECT MAX(no) FROM `inquiry_tbl` WHERE `no` < #{no})

SELECT * FROM `inquiry_tbl` WHERE `inquiryType` = #{searchType} AND `header` LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR `contents` LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY `no` DESC LIMIT #{pagination.limitStart}, #{recordSize}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `inquiry_tbl` WHERE `inquiryType` = #{searchType} AND `header` LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR `contents` LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{keyword}, '%')
